DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the efficacy of rotational technique in the insertion of i-gel
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Two Insertion Technique of I-gel
DOC.detailed_description: The i-gel is one of the 2nd generation supraglottic airways. The rotational technique is known to increase the success rate of insertion of other supraglottic airways. The investigators try to evaluate the efficacy of rotational technique in the insertion of i-gel.
DOC.criteria: Patients scheduled for general anesthesia(transurethral resection of bladder tumor or transurethral resection of the prostate) using igelTM History of recent postoperative sore throat History of difficult airway Mouth opening < 2.5 cm Emergency operation
